statements: DELETE FROM production_line_data WHERE machine_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM production_line_data WHERE defect_rate > 0.1 AND machine_output > 1000;
DELETE FROM defect_rates WHERE machine_id = 100 AND defect_type = 'faulty';
DELETE FROM machine_outputs WHERE machine_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_type = 'critical' AND machine_id IN (SELECT machine_id FROM machine_outputs WHERE output_value < 100);
DELETE FROM production_data WHERE defect_id = 3 AND machine_id = 2;
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE machine_id = 3 AND maintenance_type = 'scheduled';
DELETE FROM defect_rates WHERE machine_id = 5 AND defect_rate > 0.10;
